name: Cursor Visual Editor
description: A visual drag-and-drop design editor integrated into Cursor's AI-powered IDE that allows developers and designers to visually edit web applications with real-time code updates.
community_quotes: Ranked #2 Product of the Day on Product Hunt with 479+ upvotes
Clean UI/UX and top-notch AI integration - feels like pair programming
Can fix tiny layout annoyances without begging AI to not wreck your file
Developers report bugs and stability issues with ever-changing UI
Trustpilot reviews cite largely negative user experience due to constant UI changes

name: GPT-5.2-Codex
description: OpenAI's most advanced agentic coding model, released as part of the GPT-5.2 family, focused on professional software engineering and defensive cybersecurity with availability across CLI, IDE extensions, and cloud platforms.
community_quotes: So good at finding bugs and little inconsistencies, it's astounding
Where Claude Code is good at 'raw coding', Codex/GPT5.x excels at bug detection
Positioned as most advanced agentic coding model for professional software engineering
Developer fatigue from constant model releases - new models trumping each other weekly

name: MiniMax M2.1
description: A multilingual AI coding model optimized for various programming tools and agent frameworks, designed for "Vibe" AppDev and Native Mobile development with compact, fast, and cost-effective architecture.
community_quotes: MiniMax M2.1 is a straight up beast at UI/UX design
Using M2.1 full-time as a developer - purely for writing code
Usage of MiniMax M2 is skyrocketing in Kilo Code
Tops coding benchmarks, rivals GPT/Claude at a fraction of the cost
Significantly enhanced coding capabilities particularly in Rust

name: Junie by JetBrains
description: JetBrains' AI coding agent plugin that handles tasks autonomously or in collaboration with developers, featuring configurable command execution and agentic AI capabilities.
community_quotes: One of the best coding agents - very well integrated with IntelliJ, great for Kotlin
Junie is slow... but absolutely great! Cursor killer?
Only works with IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate, not Community Edition
Credit/quota system lacks transparency - quota depleted after 8 days of use
Struggles with understanding large code blocks over a couple kilobytes
